other_tests.findings: Normal for the age of the patient except for a mild left ventricular hypertrophy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Confirmed by computed tomography at 6 months.

other_tests.findings: Aortic annulus of 7.4 mm with mild aortic insufficiency and an ascending aortic aneurysm of 11 mm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 6 months, dilation of the aneurysm had progressed (ascending aorta 27 mm; aortic root 22 mm).

other_tests.findings: Detected a known homozygous mutation of p.Glu57Lys in fibulin-4 (the EFEMP2 gene).
